Text:
Since a lot of people read comments, but not the description, I'll sum it up for you: This album is not complete. I selected half of the songs for you. If you feel that you really like this music after listening, I strongly suggest you support the artist and the label by buying the album in the online store (link: see description).

Enjoy!
hi, would be nice if you seeded a bit longer, really would like to hear the songs! promise i will seed....

Hey tvthrawn, there are some seeders now, but I can't seed the entire day as this would kill my girlfriend who pays the electricity bill :p.

Thanks for your comment and I am seeding at the moment!
